| name = fetchprofile

Fetches the contents of a player profile from ''Minecraft'' servers.

== Usage ==
Fetches the profile of the target. It works asynchronously as the operation might take some time.

After successful completion, a message will be printed that lets users copy the contents of a fully resolved {{cd|minecraft:profile}} [[Data component format|component]] or {{cmd|give @s minecraft:player_head}} with said component.

== Syntax ==
: <code>fetchprofile name <name></code>
: <code>fetchprofile id <id></code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|name|string}}
: Specifies a player name (Without need for an online player), case-insensitive.
: {{arg desc|je=string}}

{{argument|id|uuid}}
: Specifies [[UUID]] of a player (Without need for an online player).
: {{arg desc|je=uuid}}
